1252.question: What is an example of a health-related tweet?

3-Figure1-1.png: An example of a health-related tweet is: 'Drinking alcohol may increase your risk of getting cancer, heart disease, liver disease, and other health problems.'</s>
An example of a health-related tweet is: 'Women who drink more than 24 glasses of wine a week are more likely to develop breast cancer, according to a new study.'</s>

1252.answer: The health benefits of alcohol consumption are more limited than previously thought, researchers say
